column2: We are looking for an Enthusiastic and Creative 3D Generalist who is well-versed with 3D Animation and Composition using any 3D software    ( Max, Maya, Blender, Cinema 4D ) and After Effects.   Candidate should be good in Product animation, Explainer video, Installation video and Industrial animation.   Candidate should be well versed with the following software ( After Effects and any one of 3d Software Blender / 3ds Max / Maya / Cinema 4D ).   Candidate should have knowledge of V-ray render engine.   Candidate should have knowledge of After effects and 3D Softwares Plugins.   Candidate should be good at Commutation and Eager to learn new tools and technology.
